CreateDevice.document: This API is used to create an IoT Hub device.
CreateDevice.name: Creates a device

CreatePrivateCA.document: This API is used to create a private CA certificate.
CreatePrivateCA.name: Creates a private CA certificate

CreateProduct.document: This API is used to create a new IoT communication product.
CreateProduct.name: Creates a product

DeleteDevice.document: This API is used to delete an IoT Hub device.
DeleteDevice.name: Deletes a device

DeleteDeviceShadow.document: This API is used to delete a device shadow.
DeleteDeviceShadow.name: Deletes a device shadow

DeletePrivateCA.document: This API is used to delete a private CA certificate.
DeletePrivateCA.name: Deletes a private CA certificate

DeleteProduct.document: This API is used to delete an IoT Hub product.
DeleteProduct.name: Deletes a product

DescribeDevice.document: This API is used to query device details.
DescribeDevice.name: Queries device details

DescribeDevices.document: This API is used to get the list of IoT Hub devices.
DescribeDevices.name: Gets the device list

DescribePrivateCA.document: This API is used to query private CA certificate details.
DescribePrivateCA.name: Queries private CA certificate details

DescribePrivateCABindedProducts.document: This API is used to query the products bound to a private CA certificate.
DescribePrivateCABindedProducts.name: Queries the products bound to a private CA certificate

DescribePrivateCAs.document: This API is used to get the list of private CA certificates.
DescribePrivateCAs.name: Gets the list of private CA certificates

DescribeProduct.document: This API is used to query product details.
DescribeProduct.name: Queries product details

DescribeProductCA.document: This API is used to query the CA certificates bound to a product.
DescribeProductCA.name: Queries the CA certificates bound to a product

DescribeProducts.document: This API is used to obtain the product list.
DescribeProducts.name: Obtains the product list

SetProductsForbiddenStatus.document: This API is used to enable or disable multiple products at a time.
SetProductsForbiddenStatus.name: Enables or disables multiple products at a time

UpdateDeviceLogLevel.document: This API is used to set the device log level.
UpdateDeviceLogLevel.name: Sets the device log level

UpdateDevicesEnableState.document: This API is used to enable or disable multiple devices.
UpdateDevicesEnableState.name: Enables or disables multiple devices

UpdatePrivateCA.document: This API is used to update a private CA certificate.
UpdatePrivateCA.name: Updates a private CA certificate

UpdateProductDynamicRegister.document: This API is used to update the configuration of product dynamic registration.
UpdateProductDynamicRegister.name: Updates product dynamic registration
